ComicInfo.Summary:
Flesh and Angel reach their conclusions this prog to make way for two new stories in prog 100.
Cover: Dave Gibbons (Ro-Busters)
Judge Dredd - The Day the Law Died (part 11) (John Wagner - Mick McMahon - Tom Frame)Angel (part 5 - final part) (Chris Stevens - Carlos Pino - John Aldrich)2000AD interview - Derek Meddings (on Superman the movie - the technology) (Kevin O'Neill)Ro-Busters - The Terra-Meks! (part 2) (Pat Mills - Dave Gibbons)Flesh - book two (part 14 - final part) (Geoffrey Miller - Carlos Pino - Peter Knight)2000AD Futuregraph - Holiday to Mars! (part 4) - Have a Good Trip! (design and art: Bill Le-Fevre)
